Maouloud 2019 / Terrorism: "Senegal does not need any spiritual colonization" (Macky Sall)
04 Nov 2019 by Dakaractu




President Macky Sall accompanied by a strong delegation was in the holy city of Tivaouane to visit the Caliph of Tidianes, Serigne Ababacar Sy Mansour. During his speech in the auditorium, the Head of State returned to the nagging question of terrorism growing in the sub-region and his determination to face these threats. "Senegal does not need any spiritual colonization," he said, noting that "we do not want Islam." According to him, "Islam is a religion of peace and the Prophet Muhammad (PBUH) has repeatedly illustrated it in his actions".
